title: WHIG Provides Networks Pre-Written Interview Questions and Expert Lists
description: WHIG begins systematically providing major network news programs with pre-written interview questions, suggested talking points, and recommended expert guest lists. This ensures favorable coverage of administration policies and positions while excluding dissenting voices and alternative perspectives.
significance: Demonstrates extent of White House control over supposedly independent news programming, revealing how networks became conduits for government propaganda rather than independent journalism.

sources.title: FAIR Analysis: Media Coordination During Iraq War Buildup
